item.title: CSE Crucial Pillars
item.description: CSE Crucial Pillars Hi Everyone, I got an opportunity to speak and share my thoughts and experience on Computer Science whole as a Roadmap to my Juniors. When this invitation arrived.. I was in a dilemma of :- How to Summarise CS as a whole in a deliverable of 15-20 mins.. Hereâ€™s what I summarised for the Building minds: Computer Science Engineering Journey can be presented to everyone in 3 important and key pillars :
